headline: Picard Announces Appointment of Two New Members to its Board of Directors
summary: Appointments strengthen Picard’s Board with proven expertise in capital markets and global MedTech leadershipTUCSON, Ariz., Sept. 10, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Picard Medical, Inc. (NYSE American: PMI) (“Picard” or the “Company”), parent company of SynCardia Systems LLC, maker of the world’s first U.S. and Canadian commercially-approved total artificial heart, today announced the appointment of two new members that will serve on its Board of Directors, Sam Van and George Ye. headline: Edwards Lifesciences Corporation (EW) Welcomes Newly Updated ESC/EACTS Guidelines for Severe Aortic Stenosis (AS)
summary: Edwards Lifesciences Corporation (NYSE:EW) is one of the 14 Tech Stocks to Sell Now According to Ken Fisher. In an announcement on August 29, 2025, Edwards Lifesciences Corporation (NYSE:EW) expressed its positive response to newly updated ESC/EACTS guidelines for severe aortic stenosis (AS), which recommend earlier treatment, including for asymptomatic patients, and lower the TAVR […]
